description: This CSS file contains variables for managing light and dark themes, styles for the main application, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application, including background and text colors, and layout.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button with hover and active states.
